details.problem: Developers waste time debugging issues that follow predictable patterns.
details.ideaForSolution: Use ML to identify bug-prone code patterns and suggest fixes before they cause problems.
details.characteristics: Requires training on our codebase history and integration with IDE.
details.whyNow: We now have enough historical data to train effective models.
details.smartToolsFit: Perfect application of ML for developer productivity.
details.epicFit: Aligns with our goal to improve developer experience.
details.success: 20% reduction in bug reports for identified patterns.

details.problem: Hard to diagnose UX issues without seeing what users actually experienced.
details.ideaForSolution: Privacy-focused session recording for web and mobile apps.
details.whyNow: Recent user complaints about confusing flows we can't reproduce.
details.maintenance: Storage costs increase with user base.

details.problem: Multiple API endpoints cause client complexity and performance issues.
details.ideaForSolution: Unified GraphQL layer to consolidate all backend services.
details.characteristics: Would require schema design and service adaptors.

details.problem: Our products aren't fully WCAG compliant, limiting our market reach.
details.ideaForSolution: Comprehensive audit and remediation plan with automated tests.
details.whyNow: Legal requirements increasing in our target market.
details.success: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across all products.

details.problem: Inconsistent component usage across teams leads to UX debt.
details.ideaForSolution: Expand our design system with new components and improved documentation.
details.characteristics: Collaborative effort between design and engineering.
